type: Legendary Creature – Human Knight Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Royal Lineage[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, create a Royal Role token and attach it to target creature you control. [i](If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has ward {1}.)[/i]
[i]Garreg Mach House Leader[/i] – Other creatures you control have vigilance. If you control another Garreg Mach House Leader, creatures you control have vigilance and first strike
